rooms.description: A welcoming space with a minimalist yet Bohemian aesthetic.
An open-plan area blending dining and living, featuring eclectic Bohemian decor with large windows for natural light.
A functional kitchen with modern appliances integrated into a vintage design.
The primary bedroom with large windows, Bohemian textiles, and space for a small reading nook.
A modern bathroom with eco-friendly fixtures.

openings.description: An archway entrance complemented by traditional wooden doors.
Large windows for abundant natural light, aligning with Vastu principles for energy flow.
A sliding glass door leading to the two-car garage.

rooms.description: A versatile space for work or study, incorporating Bohemian decor elements.
Optional guest bedroom with Vastu compliant layout for harmony.

openings.description: A spiral staircase integrated within a corner to connect floors, promoting an open feel.
Large windows that ensure balanced light according to Vastu guidelines.
